column5: Just got my 2nd Lews BC reel in the mail, the new Super Duty. Can hardly wait to try it this weekend. Who else loves Lews?
They are a good reel.  Smooth running.  First one made in USA now like everything else my new one is made overseas, Korea.  Cannot wait to try it out in the Niagara next month.
I got a tournament pro lews speed spool and it's great. Comparable to my Abu Revo's. Changed up some Boca bearings and it's a pitching machine. Great value reel.
I stll have one I purchased back in the late 70's....should dust it off, oil it and give it a go.
